doc:
Pierre Blaise https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre_Blaise 0 Pierre-Marc Blaise (29 February 1952 – 31 August 1975) was a French film actor. He is best known for the role of Lucien Lacombe in Louis Malle's 1974 film Lacombe, Lucien. An amateur selected for Malle's film, Blaise went on to act in three additional films, The Big Delirium, The Porcelain Anniversary and Per le antiche scale, all released in 1975. His career was cut short when he was killed in a car accident in 1975. Pierre-Marc_Blaise ( 29_February_1952 – 31_August_1975 ) was a_French_film_actor . He is_best_known for the_role of Lucien_Lacombe in Louis_Malle 's 1974_film Lacombe , Lucien . An_amateur selected for Malle 's_film , Blaise went on to_act in three_additional_films , The_Big_Delirium , The_Porcelain_Anniversary and Per le_antiche_scale , all released in 1975 . His_career was_cut short when he was_killed in a_car_accident in 1975 .
